name: Baked Apple Sweet Dip
description: Serve with 1⁄2 cup fresh fruit for dessert.
preparation: Combine sweet dip mix and yogurt. Let stand 10 min.
tips: Add dip mix to smoothies or stir into pancake, waffle, and muffin batter.

products.name: Baked Apple Sweet Dip Mix (1011082)
summary: Trust us, this isn’t one of those seasonings that just takes up cupboard space! Baked Apple Sweet Dip Mix is versatile and so good, you’ll take it way beyond the dip bowl to whip up all kinds of tasty creations this holiday and winter season. With pieces of dehydrated apple combined with cinnamon, vanilla, ginger, and nutmeg, it brings a comforting taste to baked goods, yogurt, smoothies, cheeseballs, and more.
